pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto.

The Prime Minister offered his condolences to all those affected by the recent earthquakes in Mexico, as well as those affected by Hurricane Katia earlier this month.

In keeping with the strong friendship between Canada and Mexico, the Prime Minister offered Canadian assistance to support the response and recovery efforts.

The leaders said they looked forward to the third round of NAFTA negotiations, beginning in Ottawa‎ this weekend, and to achieving a balanced outcome.
